official_title: A resolution to authorize Joyce P. Baker, professional staff member, Senate Republican Policy Committee, an employee of the United States Senate, to appear as a witness in the case of Common Cause, et al. against E. T. Klassen, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes Joyce P. Baker, professional staff member, Senate Republican Policy Committee, an employee of the United States Senate, to appear as a witness in the case of Common Cause, et. al. against E. T. Klassen, et. al.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize Joyce P. Baker, professional staff member, Senate Republican Policy Committee, an employee of the United States Senate, to appear as a witness in the case of Common Cause, et al. against E. T. Klassen, et al.
